Web is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Web is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Description: Cover an area in thick, flammable webbing that slows creatures within and possibly Enwebs them. Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Radius: 4m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: Dexterity

Web Tips & Notes

Enwebbed Status Effect: Cannot move. Attack rolls against you have advantage, while your attack rolls have disadvantage. You also have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.
